channel.title: Pages on Hi, I'm Huan.
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Hi, I'm Huan.

item.title: More about me
item.description: I am currently the Director of Engineering for the Air business unit at Hopper. I grew up playing with legos and developing a love of building things. This pretty naturally led to a career as a software engineer. I kind of accidentally stumbled into management during my time at Amazon, where I realized that building teams isn’t all that different from building distributed software systems; although the API documentation is usually a lot worse.
